original_title: 終電ないならウチおいで僕の恋人が家で待ってるのに、 終電逃がし同僚女子社員の家に泊まる流れに…ノーパンノーブラ部屋着に興奮した絶倫のボクは一晩中ヤりまくった。。。
overview: This guy misses the last train going back home, and Minami invites him to stay over.  Then, she is very openly hitting on him. He is married, but a guy just doesn’t say no to Minami Aizawa.
title: “If You’ve Missed The Last Train Home, Why Don’t You Come Over To My Place” My GF Was Waiting For Me At Home, But I Decided To Spend The Night At my Colleague’s… Minami Aizawa
